content: Hey all! At JuliaCon 2024 it was announced that Julia 1.10 will become the new LTS version. Is there any information about when this will happen? :)
presumably it'll coincide with the release of 1.11, as happened before with 1.6 & 1.7
Yeah, the policy is that a Julia version only becomes LTS after the next version releases.
Fons van der Plas has marked this topic as resolved.
